## Challenge Points (up to +12)
+ Submit to canvas a "hardy" and "clear" reflection for each session you attend.
  + This can be in paragraph form or some sort of creative "sketch" format.
  + What did you learn? How does this relate to your current or future experiences?
+ Each "reflection" gets you +1 challenge point
+ Turn in one document for all session reflections
  + Make sure to indicate with a header, which talk you attended.
  + You can write/sketch this in any document editor of your choosing (Word, Quarto, Google Docs, Excalidraw, etc.)
+ You can submit reflections for up to **12 talks**.
  + Please make sure to indicate how many talks you attended.
  
**Due Sunday, March 19, 2023 at 11:59pm**

See the [conference program](https://shinyconf.appsilon.com/conference-scheduler/?utm_medium=social&utm_source=twitter&utm_campaign=scheduler) for a list of session talks.
